# Agile Climber
## Overview
*Agile Climber (Ex):* A rogue with this talent rolls twice while making [[Climb (Skill)|Climb]] checks and when making Reflex saves to avoid falling and takes the better result.

**Source:** Legendary Rogues (Legendary Games), pg. 8
